page.title: 01LERWICK AND ITS SURROUNDINGS
page.content: SHETLAND IS A GROUP OF ISLANDS 200 MILES NORTH OF ABERDEEN. LERWICK IS THE MAIN TOWN WITH A POPULATION OF{7384. THE WEATHER IS VARIED AND CAN CHANGE QUICKLY WHICH AFFECTS THE LINK WITH ABERDEEN. THE{ST CLAIR}BRINGS FREIGHT AND PASSENGERS THREE TIMES A WEEK. LERWICK STRETCHES BETWEEN{STANEYHILL} AND{SOUND}AND IS MAINLY RESIDENTIAL AND COMMERCIAL. THE LAND COVER AROUND THE TOWN IS MAINLY HEATHER AND HEATH. THE MAIN INDUSTRIES ARE FISHING, FARMING,KNITTING,OIL AND TOURISM.THE TOWN HAS TWO PRIMARY SCHOOLS,{SOUND {SCHOOL}AND{BELL'S BRAE SCHOOL}AND ONE SECONDARY SCHOOL,{THE ANDERSON HIGH {SCHOOL.}WE HAVE A DANGEROUS,RUGGED BUT BEAUTIFUL COASTLINE WHERE BIRDS COME TO NEST IN SPRING.
